    com.koloboke.collect.map
    Contains interfaces of Map specializations, their factories and cursors.
    com.koloboke.function
    The complete set of functional interfaces, following java.util.function scheme.

    • Uses of CharCharToCharFunction in com.koloboke.collect.map

      Methods in com.koloboke.collect.map with parameters of type CharCharToCharFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char CharCharMap.compute(char key, CharCharToCharFunction remappingFunction)
      Attempts to compute a mapping for the specified key and its current mapped value (or default value if there is no current mapping).
      char CharCharMap.computeIfPresent(char key, CharCharToCharFunction remappingFunction)
      If the value for the specified key is present, attempts to compute a new mapping given the key and its current mapped value.
      void CharCharMap.replaceAll(CharCharToCharFunction function)
      Replaces each entry's value with the result of invoking the given function on that entry, in the order entries are returned by an entry set iterator, until all entries have been processed or the function throws an exception.
